exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
exercises.description: Incline the bench. Hold the dumbbells below your shoulders with your arms straight using an underahnd grip. Perform the curl by bending your elbows and raising the dumbbells until they touch your chest. Return to the starting position in a slow and controlled manner.

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Overhead Press
exercises.description: Pin your shoulder blades into the bench and plant you feet firmly on the ground. Engage the core and then press the dumbbells up by extending both arms straight up overhead. Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Decline Situps
exercises.description: Set a decline bench to a 30-45 degree angle. Sit on the bench with your knees bent and feet hooked under the padded bar. Lie flat with your back against the bench. Brace your core and pull your belly button towards your spine. Flex your spine to bring your torso off the bench until you're sitting upright. Pause briefly, then slowly lower yourself back down to the bench

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Get into a push up position, with your elbows under your shoulders and your feet hip-width apart. Bend your elbows and rest your weight on your forearms and on your toes, keeping your body in a straight line. Hold the position.

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Wrist Curl
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells at hips, curl your wrists and lift the dumbbell high.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.description: Lift your feet, twist left and right.

exercises.name: Adduction Machine
exercises.description: Engage your inner thighs and squees your knees together.

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Shrugs
exercises.description: Hold umbbelss at your hips, shrug your shoulders up

exercises.name: Dumbbell Skull Crusher
exercises.description: Flat bar, extend dumbbells down to your forehead

exercises.name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.description: kneel on the bench, extend arm fully down, then pull back towards your chest

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Push the pads out with your knees

exercises.name: Barbell Deadlift
exercises.description: Stand and hold barbell, lower barbell to the floor

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Stand up, raise up on to your toes
